docs.snippet: A lieutenant colonel in Kansas' Civil Air Patrol has resigned his command after posting on Facebook that a state lawmaker should "swing from a tree" for introducing a bill that would undo a law allowing concealed weapons on college campuses starti...
docs.lead_paragraph: A lieutenant colonel in Kansas' Civil Air Patrol has resigned his command after posting on Facebook that a state lawmaker should "swing from a tree" for introducing a bill that would undo a law allowing concealed weapons on college campuses starting in July.

headline.main: Civil Air Patrol Officer Out After 'Swing From a Tree' Post
headline.print_headline: Civil Air Patrol Officer Out After 'Swing From a Tree' Post

docs.snippet: The head of the Chicago Police Department said Wednesday that his officers are now using high-tech strategies and equipment to fight crime, an announcement that came as the city's police released statistics showing no letup in the death toll that ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The head of the Chicago Police Department said Wednesday that his officers are now using high-tech strategies and equipment to fight crime, an announcement that came as the city's police released statistics showing no letup in the death toll that captured the nation's attention last year and sparked a Twitter warning last week from President Donald Trump.

headline.main: Chicago Police Now Using High-Tech Effort to Fight Crime
